name: Elegant Zazzle Plugin (EZP)
author: Hupshee

sections.description:
The Elegant Zazzle Plugin (E.Z.P.) allows you to easily display Zazzle products on your WordPress site one of two ways:
* via WordPress shortcodes in a blog post or page.
* via widget in a widget area.

With this plugin, you can easily advertise your Zazzle products on your WordPress site. Zazzle is free to join and easy to use.

To use via shortcode

Enter some text like this into any page or a post:
[ezp grid_width=”600″ grid_cell_size=”medium” grid_cell_spacing=”40″ num_items=”3″ store_name=”lupitafdezsoberon”]
This will show 3 products, each of medium size and 40 pixels apart, from the Zazzle store lupitafdezsoberon in a grid that is 600 pixels wide. All the configuration options are listed here.

To use via widget

Goto to Appearance -> Wigets and drag and drop the Zazzle Widget to any widget area supported by your theme. All the configuration options are listed here.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload files to wp-content/plugins/zazzle-plugin
  2. Activate it through the plugin management screen.
sections.faq:
What is Zazzle?

http://www.zazzle.com

Zazzle enables content owners to unlock their entire libraries of content, making it available for purchase and customization by consumers. Through the Zazzle platform, users can instantly create, customize to fit their personal style, purchase and sell a near infinite array of products online.

What other configuration options does the plugin support?

All the configuration options are listed here.

What other configuration options does the widget support?

All the configuration options are listed here.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First public release.

0.2

  • Updated functions with default parameters.

1.1

  • Major update. Now includes support for all Zazzle domains and currencies. Improved display.
